mapper.select: /* NvrScheduleHistoryMapper.historyListByGrid 조회 */ select a.history_id , (select b.schedule_name from nvr_schedule b where a.schedule_id = b.schedule_id) as schedule_name , (select b.movie_name from movie b where a.movie_id = b.movie_id) as movie_name , a.downloaded_yn , a.fail_reason , date_format(a.reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as reg_dt , (select b.save_path from movie b where a.movie_id = b.movie_id) as save_path from nvr_schedule_history a where schedule_id = #{scheduleId}

/* NvrScheduleHistoryMapper.findNextHistoryId 다음 스케쥴이력아이디 조회 */ select case when max(history_id) is null then 'HISTORY0001' else concat( 'HISTORY', lpad(substring(max(history_id), 8) + 1, 4, '0') ) end as history_id from nvr_schedule_history
